item.title: Go Public Service Announcement - Custom Transport
item.description: For the love of proxies - please read this. The following example code overrides the HTTP client’s DefaultTransport in order to optionally verifies the server’s certificate chain and hostname.

item.title: Game Exploit Retrospective
item.description: I recently dedicated some time to explore the software security space and gain some hands-on experience through exercises like developing game exploits.
